sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const mediaTeasers = [ { pretitle: 'Pretitle Text', title: 'Feature Title Style as Desktop Heading Smaller', body: 'This is the body content of the teaser. It can contain paragraphs, lists, or any other HTML content. This example uses a paragraph for simplicity.', image: 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/cms.ipressroom.com/219/files/20252/nvidia-cosmos.jpg', ctas: [ { text: 'Project', href: '#' }, { text: 'Paper', href: '#' }, { text: 'Code', href: '#' }, ], }, { pretitle: 'Pretitle Text', title: 'Feature Title Style as Desktop Heading Smaller', body: 'This is the body content of the teaser. It can contain paragraphs, lists, or any other HTML content. This example uses a paragraph for simplicity.', image: 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/cms.ipressroom.com/219/files/20252/nvidia-cosmos.jpg', ctas: [ { text: 'Project', href: '#' }, { text: 'Paper', href: '#' }, ], }, { pretitle: 'Pretitle Text', title: 'Feature Title Style as Desktop Heading Smaller', body: 'This is the body content of the teaser. It can contain paragraphs, lists, or any other HTML content. This example uses a paragraph for simplicity.', image: 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/cms.ipressroom.com/219/files/20252/nvidia-cosmos.jpg', ctas: [ { text: 'Project', href: '#' }, { text: 'Paper', href: '#' }, { text: 'Code', href: '#' }, ], }, ]; const ThreeMediaTeaser = () => (

Projects and Publications

{mediaTeasers.map((teaser, idx) => (
{teaser.pretitle}

{teaser.title}

{teaser.body}

{teaser.ctas.map((cta, i) => ( {cta.text} ))}
))}
); export default ThreeMediaTeaser;
